class_description:
A "PropertyChange" event gets delivered whenever a bean changes a "bound"
 or "constrained" property.  A PropertyChangeEvent object is sent as an
 argument to the PropertyChangeListener and VetoableChangeListener methods. Normally PropertyChangeEvents are accompanied by the name and the old
 and new value of the changed property.  If the new value is a primitive
 type (such as int or boolean) it must be wrapped as the
 corresponding java.lang.* Object type (such as Integer or Boolean). Null values may be provided for the old and the new values if their
 true values are not known. An event source may send a null object as the name to indicate that an
 arbitrary set of if its properties have changed.  In this case the
 old and new values should also be null.

params.param_description: the bean that fired the event
the programmatic name of the property that was changed
the old value of the property
the new value of the property

return_description:
The new value for the property, expressed as an Object.
          May be null if multiple properties have changed.

Methods.method_description: Gets the new value for the property, expressed as an Object.

return_description:
The old value for the property, expressed as an Object.
          May be null if multiple properties have changed.

Methods.method_description: Gets the old value for the property, expressed as an Object.

return_description:
the propagationId object associated with a bound/constrained
          property update.

Methods.method_description:
The "propagationId" field is reserved for future use.  In Beans 1.0
 the sole requirement is that if a listener catches a PropertyChangeEvent
 and then fires a PropertyChangeEvent of its own, then it should
 make sure that it propagates the propagationId field from its
 incoming event to its outgoing event.

return_description:
The programmatic name of the property that was changed.
          May be null if multiple properties have changed.

Methods.method_description: Gets the programmatic name of the property that was changed.

params.param_description: The propagationId object for the event.

Methods.method_description: Sets the propagationId object for the event.

return_description: a string representation of the object

Methods.method_description: Returns a string representation of the object.
